<strong>Wednesday, Mar 8th 2023</strong><a href="/home/weather/index.html">
<span class="">10PM</span>
<strong>46°F</strong>

<div class="articleWide cleared">
<div class="alpha">
<div class="article-text wide heading-tag-switch" id="js-article-text">
<h2>Jeff Bezos parties with Bill Gates as the Microsoft founder celebrates his 66th birthday with 50 friends on a $2million-a-week private yacht before helicoptering them all to an exclusive resort in Turkey</h2><ul class="mol-bullets-with-font"><li class="class"><strong>Bill Gates invited fellow billionaire Jeff Bezos to his birthday bash in Turkey </strong></li><li class="class"><strong>Gates, who is worth $136 billion, transported his 50 guests by helicopter from his $2million-a-week rental yacht 'Lana' to the Sea Me Beach club in Fethiye </strong></li><li class="class"><strong>He invited the world's richest man, Amazon founder Jeff Bezos - who is worth $195.9 billion - to celebrate the day with him and his friends</strong></li><li class="class"><strong>It's Gates' first birthday celebration since announcing his divorce to wife of 27 years Melinda Gates, with whom he shares three children </strong></li><li class="class"><strong>Guests enjoyed a menu offering local seafood, sushi, pizza, and champagne </strong></li></ul><p class="author-section byline-plain">By <a class="author" href="/home/search.html?s=&amp;authornamef=Andrea+Blanco+For+Dailymail.Com">Andrea Blanco For Dailymail.Com</a> </p><p class="byline-section"><span class="article-timestamp article-timestamp-published"> <span class="article-timestamp-label">Published:</span> <time datetime="2021-10-31T03:56:55+0000"> 23:56 EST, 30 October 2021 </time> </span> | <span class="article-timestamp article-timestamp-updated"> <span class="article-timestamp-label">Updated:</span> <time datetime="2021-11-01T14:51:20+0000"> 10:51 EST, 1 November 2021 </time> </span> </p><p></p><div data-preferred-shared-network-enabled="" id="articleIconLinksContainer"> <ul>
<li class="share-facebook-long"></li>
<li class="share-fbmessenger">
<a class="js-tl" rel=""></a>
</li>
<li class="share-whatsapp"></li>
<li class="share-twitter"></li>

ughter-Princess-Lilibet-Diana-christened.html%3Fito%3Demail_share_article-top_most-read-articles%0A%0A"     http://www.omniture.com --> <script type="text/javascript">
      var searchTerms = '';
    </script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    /* <![CDATA[ */
    (function() {
        window.dm = window.dm ||{ AjaxData:[]};
        window.dm.AjaxEvent = function(et, d, ssid, ad){
            dm.AjaxData.push({ et: et,d: d,ssid: ssid,ad: ad});
            window.DotMetricsObj && DotMetricsObj.onAjaxDataUpdate();
        };
        var d = document,
        h = d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
        s = d.createElement('script');

    var refererHost = "direct";

    if (document.referrer) {
        var docReferrerHostMatches = new RegExp("://([^/]*)/.*").exec(document.referrer);
        /* Check just to be safe */
        if (docReferrerHostMatches) {
            var docReferrerHost = docReferrerHostMatches[1];
            refererHost = docReferrerHost;
        }
    }

    DM.pageEvents.listen(DM.pageEvents.PAGE_LOGIN_BUTTON_CLICKED, function (obj, event, pars){
        if (pars.action === 'loggingIn'){
            document.cookie = "attempting_login=true; path=/";
        }
    });

<!-- <![endif]--> <script type="text/javascript">

</script> <!-- CWV --><div itemprop="articleBody"><p class="mol-para-with-font">Multi-billionaire and Microsoft founder <a href="/news/bill-gates/index.html" id="mol-95e9d9d0-39fe-11ec-8f67-ffd21e94a544" style="font-weight: bold;">Bill Gates</a> celebrated his 66th birthday in Turkey in the company of fellow tycoon and Amazon founder <a href="/news/jeff-bezos/index.html" id="mol-95f1c910-39fe-11ec-8f67-ffd21e94a544" style="font-weight: bold;">Jeff Bezos</a> on Friday.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Bezos was among the 50 guests invited to Gates' private party beside the Mediterranean. It's not clear whether any of Gates' family helped him celebrate at his exclusive bash. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Gates - once the richest man on earth who has dropped to fourth on the Forbes Rich List ranking with $124 billion - transported his guests by helicopter from his $2million-a-week rental yacht 'Lana' to the Sea Me Beach club in Fethiye.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Lana boasts a gym, jacuzzi, beach club, and swimming pool, <a class="class" href="https://www.businessinsider.com/turkey-bill-gates-jeff-bezos-celebrates-66th-birthday-party-2021-10" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" style="font-weight: bold;" target="_blank">Insider</a> reported.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">After the party, Bezos - who is worth $177 billion, according to Forbes - was reported to have returned by helicopter to his yacht 'Flying Fox' docked in Gokova.  </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Attendees of the four-hour party were secured of their privacy in the lavish and secluded resort, as workers at the bash were prohibited from using their phones.</p><div class="artSplitter mol-img-group" style="style"><div class="splitLeft"><div class="mol-img"> <div his guests by helicopter from his €1.8million-a-week rental yacht 'Lana' to the Sea Me Beach club in Fethiye</p></div><div class="artSplitter mol-img-group" style="style"> <div class="mol-img"> <div src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="max-width:100%" width="634"/> </div> <noscript> <img alt="Attendees of the four-hour party were secured of of their privacy in the lavish and secluded resort, as workers at the bash were prohibited from using their phones</p></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">Gates, whose birthday is October 28, reportedly entertained his guests with local seafood, sushi, pizza, and plenty of champagne.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">The Microsoft founder had been visiting Bodrum, a popular town about four hours from Fethiye, last week. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">It's Gates' first birthday celebration since announcing his divorce to wife of 27 years Melinda Gates, with whom he shares three children. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Gates, 65, and his ex-wife, 56, shocked the world when they took to Twitter to break the news of their divorce back on May 4.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">They tweeted that they 'no longer believed we can grow together as a couple' but they will still continue to work together at the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">The couple became officially divorced in August, just four months after filing.  </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">In the wake of the divorce announcement Gates has been accused of 'womanizing' and sexually harassing colleagues during his time at Microsoft. </p><div><div class="related-carousel with-fb-or-tw news half" data-dm-rotator-active-class="active" src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">Their relationship reportedly began to unravel after Melinda read the letter a Microsoft employee wrote in 2019 detailing her billionaire husband's 'inappropriate' sexual relationship with a female staff member.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Two decades after the 2000 affair, Gates was removed from Microsoft's board of directors as it investigated his prior romantic relationship with an employee, which 'ended amicably'. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Before the divorce, Melinda would share heartfelt posts on social media commemorating Gates' birthday.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">In 2018, she shared a picture of them at the Goalkeepers event.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">She captioned it: 'It's no secret that he's a little nerdy. But what surprised me when I first met him is how funny he is, too.'</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">In 2017, she posted a pic of their honeymoon in Hawaii in 1994.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'Curious, fun, brilliant...and looks great in a lei,' she wrote.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Last year, Melinda skipped her custom post, after reports in 2019 that her husband had written a pros-and-cons list of their marriage.  </p><div class="mol-img-group artSplitter" style="style"> <div class="mol-img"> <div class="image-wrap"> <img alt="Father-daughter: Excited to hear about what you learn in this next turn around the sun'" class="blkBorder img-share" height="305" id="i-8e23fa5d707ff397" src="https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2021/10/31/03/49755125-10149009-_Happy_happy_66th_thisisbillgates_she_wrote_Grateful_to_learn_fr-a-32_1635651116601.jpg" width="306"/> </noscript> </div> <div><div> <span></span> <div></div></div></div><p class="imageCaption">'Happy happy 66th @thisisbillgates,' she wrote. 'Grateful to learn from your example of endless curiosity, constant exploration and desire to help humanity. Excited to hear about what you learn in this next turn around the sun'</p></div><p class="mol-para-with-font">Jennifer Gates, the couple's eldest daughter, shared a picture capturing her father beaming at her in her bridal gown along with birthday wishes on Instagram.</p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'Grateful to learn from your example of endless curiosity, constant exploration and desire to help humanity. Excited to hear about what you learn in this next turn around the sun,' she wrote. </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">'Thank you for your support of our union and dream day recently - these memories will last a lifetime,' Jennifer added.  </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Both Bill and Melinda were there to walk Jennifer down the asile on her big day.   </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Jennifer and husband Nayel Nessar hosted 300 guests at her mansion in North Salem, New York on October 16.  </p><p class="mol-para-with-font">Bill and Melinda posted photos from the wedding on Instagram on Monday along with messages for the happy couple.    </p><div class="moduleFull mol-video"><div><div itemprop="video" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/VideoObject"><meta
